| History                 = The Black Cullens were an Irish mob operating in Manhattan, west of 7th Avenue. They were involved in protection rackets, cigarette and liquor smuggling, loansharking, policy, stolen goods, and drugs.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 42}}{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 61}}

They went to war with the Korean Mafia and had repeated confrontations with [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]], decimating the organization and resulting in the loss of the male leadership.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 42}}{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 23}}{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 68|72}} The crime family was last seen led by a woman, [[Lori Pierce (Earth-616)|Lori Pierce]].{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 72}}

| Notes                   = [[Lyle Cullen (Earth-616)|Lyle]] and [[Alfie Cullen (Earth-616)|Alfie]] in their only appearances does not seem to be killed, but in [[Punisher War Journal Vol 1 72]] after the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] kills [[Bobo Cullen (Earth-616)|Bobo]] is written that he was the last of the Cullens, as such even Lyle and Alfie presumably have been previously killed off-panel.
